Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Houston in 2014...
Injured on 4/30/2014 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/8/2014 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 8-9 weeks...
Injured on 6/8/2015 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Traded from Houston to Miami on 7/29/2015 (Going to HOU: P Junichi Tazawa, CF Courtney Hawkins. Going to MIA: CF Ulises Segura)...
Injured on 9/4/2015 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/7/2016 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...

Hit first career homerun on 6/21/2017, off Zach Jones (ATL)...
